title: Kupperman on Native American Exchanges - Evidence

content.prompt: Which of the following developments could best be used as evidence to support Kuppermanâ€™s argument about Native American responses to colonialism?

choices.label: The adoption of European weaponry by Native American groups
The denial of Native American sovereignty by some settlers
The introduction of cattle to Native Americans by Europeans
The use of Native American labor by settlers in the encomienda system

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
